Package eea.engine.component

This package provides the abstract classes for components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Component A Component is an abstract element that has a ID and an owner.
RenderComponent A RenderComponent is an abstract component that is used as a base for all game entities that can be rendered (shown on the game screen).
 

Package eea.engine.component Description

This package provides the abstract classes for components. Components are separated into general components and RenderComponents that represent entities with an ID that are rendered (displayed) on the game display. Each component has an ID and an underlying game object (of type Entity) associated with the component. RenderComponents additionally provide methods for returning their current size and for rendering them on the screen. For more information on the renderable components, please see the eea.engine.component.render package.
